# createSingleSignerRIAccountClient

Creates a single signer RI account client using the provided configuration parameters.

## Import

```ts
import { createSingleSignerRIAccountClient } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
```

## Usage

```ts
import { http } from "viem";
import { createSingleSignerRIAccountClient } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
import { LocalAccountSigner } from "@aa-sdk/core";
import { sepolia } from "@account-kit/infra";

const MNEMONIC = "...";
const RPC_URL = "...";

const signer = LocalAccountSigner.mnemonicToAccountSigner(MNEMONIC);

const chain = sepolia;

const transport = http(RPC_URL);

const singleSignerRIAccountClient = await createSingleSignerRIAccountClient({
  chain,
  signer,
  transport,
});
```

## Parameters

### config

`CreateSingleSignerRIAccountClientParams`
The configuration parameters required to create the single signer RI account client

## Returns

`Promise<SmartAccountClient>`
A promise that resolves to a `SmartAccountClient` instance
